Research

Publications and Conferences.

  • Granna, Brunauer, Lang, 2022. Proposing a global model to overcome the bias-variance tradeoff in the context of hedonic house price models. ERES Conference 2022, Milano, Italy.

  • Granna, Brunauer, Lang, 2021. Reducing bias of hedonic house price indices. ERES Conference 2021, Kaiserslautern, Germany.

  • Granna, 2019. Comparing hedonic house price indices. Master thesis.

Teaching
